version_description:
- Fixed bugs with loading tracks Castleroad and Distant gorge
- Fixed bugs with buying and missing a car
- Improved championship interface
- Improved steering wheel control and arrows control interfaces
- Rebalancing the economy and offers in the store

- Improved graphics
- Optimized game performance on all devices
- Reworked the control system, now the game has more settings for the steering wheel, gyroscope and buttons
- Fixed bugs on leaderboards
- Added new narrower track Foothill edges
- Changes in the content of championships
- The difficulty of turns is displayed in color on the minimap

- New interface, and interface navigation
- Content overhaul on certain levels. New side objects, destructible obstacles, and machinery
- Changes in road width on certain tracks
- New road surface bumps and obstacles
- Improvements of vehicle handling physics
- Vehicle and environment sounds improvements
- Overall optimisation and bug fixes
- Added detailed car tuning

- App size reduction
- Vehicle handling physics impovement
- Graphics optimization for low-end devices
- Revision of steering rudder controls
- Improved interface navigation in championships
- Camera improvements
- Small, point changes of level design on certain tracks
- Overall bug fixes
